tool.name: MapStatistics
tool.description: Extract extended statistics on the features of a map for quality control.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #if $out_FLAG: mkdir out && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #if $out_FLAG: -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' #end if #if not($out_FLAG): | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if $out_FLAG: && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("txt")}' '$out' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: out_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out (Optional output txt file)
param.help: If empty, the output is written to the command line

param.name: n
param.label: Report separate statistics for each of n RT slices of the map

param.name: m
param.label: Show meta information about the whole experiment

param.name: s
param.label: Computes a summary statistics of intensities, qualities, and widths

tool.help:
Extract extended statistics on the features of a map for quality control.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/TOPP_MapStatistics.html
